name: maestro
description: Multi-agent orchestration extension that assembles specialized dev teams for complex engineering tasks

settings.name: Default Model
settings.description: Model used by all agents unless individually overridden (e.g., gemini-3-pro-preview, gemini-2.5-pro)

settings.name: Writer Model
settings.description: Model for technical-writer agent (defaults to gemini-3-flash-preview for cost efficiency)

settings.name: Default Temperature
settings.description: Default temperature for all agents (0.0-1.0, default: 0.2), individual agent temperatures override this

settings.name: Agent Timeout
settings.description: Default timeout for subagent execution in minutes (default: 10)

settings.name: Disabled Agents
settings.description: Comma-separated list of agents to disable (e.g., security-engineer,devops-engineer), disabled agents won't be assigned phases

settings.name: Max Retries
settings.description: Maximum retry attempts per phase before escalating to user (default: 2)

settings.name: Auto Archive
settings.description: Automatically archive sessions on completion (true/false, default: true)

settings.name: Validation Strictness
settings.description: Validation strictness level (strict/normal/lenient): strict fails on warnings, normal fails on errors only, lenient reports but continues (default: normal)

settings.name: State Directory
settings.description: Directory for session state and plans, relative to project root (default: .gemini)

settings.name: Max Concurrent Agents
settings.description: Maximum agents running simultaneously in parallel dispatch (0 = unlimited, default: 0)

settings.name: Stagger Delay
settings.description: Seconds between parallel agent launches to prevent rate-limiting (default: 5)

settings.name: Execution Mode
settings.description: Phase 3 dispatch mode: parallel (concurrent agents), sequential (one at a time), or ask (prompt user). Default: ask
